import React, { Component } from "react"; import Helmet from "react-helmet"; import NavBar from "../navbar/nav-bar"; import FooterNav from "../footer-nav/footer-nav"; import "./dev-process.css"; class DevProcess extends Component { state = {}; render() { return ( <> Portfolio - Development Process

Development Process

Discovery

Project Objectives

This stage is where I explore the needs of the client to determine what outcome they want from themselves or their customers. I also probe for information from a technical perceptive to guide non-technical clients.

Project Branding

This stage is where I explore the clients ideas of branding and theme of project. If the client does not have ideas I provide some examples.

Existing Examples

This is the stage where I collect any existing examples of design or functionality examples to be considered while developing the current project

Brain Storming

Mood Board

This documment is produced to capture all the projecet branding and examples provided by the client. This is then used as a visual design colors and themes

Color Scheme

Project Scoping

Plan Review

Prototyping

Wireframing

MVP

Project Timeline

Prototype Review

Development

Sprints

Unit testing

Acceptance Review

Deployment

); } } export default DevProcess;
